page.title: 04Our School And The Estate.
page.content: The Springfields Estate was built 20 years ago. The Rugeley Council built the houses. The streets were named after men who supported the working people of England. Wat Tyler and John Ball lived 600 years ago. Places like Catkin Walk, Bracken Way, Fernwood Drive and Moss Green were named after plants and trees. Aneurin Bevan lived 30 years ago and is another man who supported the working people of England. The private streets were named after people who were chairmen of the Rugeley Council. Rugeley's twin is in the United States of America and it is called Western Springs which is in a state called Illinois. In 1962 the Telstar satellite started and the first people to have a conversation were Mr. Les Madden and Mr. Howard Knowlton. Les Madden was my best friend Andrew's Dad.
